channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preorders: Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Do you need a Switch 2 to play GameCube games? What time do preorders start? Can you queue outside GameStop on June 5? We've answered all your burning...

item.title: Froda secures $23M Series B for its debt financing platform for SMEs
item.description: Swedish Fintech startup Froda has secured a $22.7 million (€20m) Series B round led by Incore Invest, also based in Sweden. The move bucks the trend o...

item.title: Xprize Carbon awarded to a dirt simple carbon removal technology
item.description: Mati Carbon walked away with the $50 million grand prize for its enhanced rock weathering program that locks carbon in soils for thousands of years.

item.title: Tech resilience, breakout startups, and banking reinvented: The big conversations at StrictlyVC London in May
item.description: StrictlyVC is heading to London on May 13, uniting top investors and entrepreneurs to spark meaningful connections and drive forward innovation. We’re...

item.title: Muscle Memory Isn’t What You Think It Is
item.description: In her new book, On Muscle, Bonnie Tsui investigates the other stuff our thews remember—like how to grow when you exercise.

item.title: Cynomi cinches $37M for its AI-based ‘virtual CISO’ for SMB cybersecurity
item.description: Small and medium businesses are the newest targets for cybersecurity attacks, with 1 in 3 breached last year. SMBs are becoming more proactive in dete...

item.title: Bad News for China: Rare Earth Elements Aren’t That Rare
item.description: China is limiting US access to critical minerals in response to President Donald Trump’s tariffs, but the move isn’t as devastating as Beijing wants i...

item.title: The 9 Best Pillows We Found After Months of Testing (2025)
item.description: We spent months sleeping on various pillows to find the right support for your noggin whether you snooze on your side, back, or in a tangle of blanket...

item.title: Finland Could Be the First Country in the World to Bury Nuclear Waste Permanently
item.description: In March, Finland successfully completed the first test of its encapsulation plant, which, if finished, will become the world’s first permanent underg...

item.title: StrictlyVC heads to Athens for in-depth conversations on European innovation and investment
item.description: StrictlyVC is turning up the heat in 2025 — and we’re going international! First stop: Athens, May 8. Get ready for sharp, unfiltered conversations on...
